root.input.util

Class SimilarityMatrixMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable>
      • root.input.util.SimilarityMatrixMapper

  • public final class SimilarityMatrixMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable>

    Mapper class for creating similarity matrix

    Calculates pairwise distances from every seed vector. Row Value equals the negative distance from the input vector and the vector of the Row Number. When Row Number equals Column Number, the distance must be calculated in a special way.

    Input key [Text]: column number
    Input value [VectorWritable]: the corresponding vector

    Output key [Text]: tab separated list: {Column Number, LevelNumber, ID}
    Output value [VectorWritable]: {Row Number : Row Value, Row Number : Row Value,...}

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
    See Also:
    CreateSimilarityMatrixJob, CreateSeedVector, DenseVector
